name: Multifungsi
description:
1. Babi Ngepet // Multifungsi
In Indonesian lore, babi ngepet is a person who uses a black magic to transform into a wild pig. In the pig form, they commonly sneak into people’s homes and rub their bodies on the walls and furniture, which belived would magically draw the household’s money and other precious items. and when they’re to their original form, the items that just stolen are their.


a part of my Inktober serial Illustrations titled ‘Indonesian Horror Stories’. 

thank you!

JPEG
